sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The price of our redemption A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the sixt of Aprill last, 1617. By Charles Richardson, preacher at Saint Katherines neere the Tower of London. Richardson, Charles, fl. 1612-1617.
[6], 120 p.
By W. Iaggard, for W. Butler, and are to be solde at his shop in the Bulwarke, neere the Tower of London, Printed at London : 1617.
Identified as STC 21015a on UMI microfilm, reel 663. Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library. Appears at reel 663 #8 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1609 #3 (British Library copy).
=======

[6], 120 p.
By W. Iaggard, for W. Butler, and are to be solde at his shop in the Bulwarke, neere the Tower of London, Printed at London : 1617.
Identified as STC 21015a on UMI microfilm, reel 663. Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library. Appears at reel 663 #8 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy), and at reel 1609 #3 (British Library copy).
